description: A Guernsey Police recruitment drive which resembled the film featured armed raids and car chases.
title: Guernsey Police 'Hot Fuzz' campaign attracts 39 applications
title_page: Guernsey Police 'Hot Fuzz' campaign attracts 39 applications - BBC News
maintext: The force was unable to quantify the staffing costs associated with the film and fallout and said: "There was no direct cost responding to the issues that emerged after its publication, other than staff time."
